body.name: Logicfox Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair, Computer Desk Chair with 3D Armrests, Adjustable Lumbar Cushion & Adjustable Headrest, High Back Home Desk Chair with Tilt Function, Mesh Backrest & Seat
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 8 mins
features: [Breathable Mesh Back & Breathable Mesh Seat] - To keep you cool, the ergonomic office chair backrest and seat are designed for max airflow, woven for strength, and BIFMA tested for durability.

[Adjustable 3D Armrests & Headrest] - The home desk chair with adjustable 3D armrests allowing you to find the perfect height and angle for arms and shoulders. The armrests can adjust back & forth, up & down and rotate 35°. Additionally, the computer chair's headrest can adjust up and down, providing plenty of head support.

[Flexible Lumbar Support Cushion] - The ergonomic office chair provides a 1-inch thick adjustable height flexible lumbar cushion, the comfortable office chair protects the natural curvature of your spine and eases both pain and stiffness. Instead of dictating the inward curve, it responds to the unique shape of your body to provide tailored support.

[Stabilizing Backrest Corrects Your posture] - The ergonomic office chair features adjustable tension and up to 40° of recline. Lockable across three key positions, each designed to keep your spine stable and support your lumbar area. The comfortable office chair is wrapped in highly elastic stretch mesh, providing gentle posture-perfecting resistance.

[Premium Quality Assurance & Multi-Surface Casters with Quiet Roll] - To provide greater stability and strength, the mesh office chair comes with a polished heavy-duty aluminum base and a Class-3 gas lift. The multi-surface casters with quiet roll are designed to be used on any surface.

[Easy to Install & 3 Years Warranty] - The computer chair is BIFMA and SGS certified and can hold up to 300 lbs. The mesh office chair provides 3 years of after-sales service. The Logicfox home desk chair can be easily installed within 15 minutes, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable 2D Headrest 1.2-inch height Adjustable headrest with Arc up/down features which can better support your head adaptively, helping to alleviate your head and neck pressure. 1 Inch Memory Foam Waist Support Adjustable Height Memory Foam Lumbar Support In addition to the S-shaped ergonomic chair backrest design, it also provides a 1-inch thick cotton back for ample, comfortable and soft support for your waist. Fully Adjustable Armrests Adjustable 3D Armrests The ergonomic chair comes with adjustable 3D armrests that can be adjusted up and down, back and forth, swivel, very comfortable and help reduce the pressure on your shoulders. Recline the office chair freely Locking back tilt function in 3 position The computer chair has 3 lockable positions and the seat can be tilted up to 40°. The gas lift height can be adjusted from 17" to 20" to suit people of all sizes. Durable & Breathable Chair Backrest Full Breathable Mesh Design The office chair simulates the structure of the human body curve, using ergonomic design, more closely fit the body, making the office more relaxed.
Adjustable Height Memory Foam Lumbar Support
Encouraging great posture with up to 8 points of adjustment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Ergonomic Chair for Comfort and Support!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Logicfox Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase! This chair is a game-changer for my home office setup. The 3D armrests are incredibly adjustable, allowing me to find the perfect position for my arms and shoulders. The adjustable lumbar cushion provides just the right amount of support for my lower back, and the 2D headrest is a wonderful addition for those moments when I need to lean back and take a breather.The black high back design not only looks sleek and professional, but it also offers excellent support for my entire back. The tilt function is a great feature, allowing me to recline and take short breaks without compromising my comfort. The mesh backrest and seat are a dream in terms of breathability, keeping me cool even during longer work sessions.Assembly was a breeze with clear instructions, and the chair feels sturdy and well-built. Overall, I can't recommend the Logicfox Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair enough. It's improved my workspace comfort and productivity significantly. A definite 5-star purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am truly in love with this chair!
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, and I play video games on my personal gaming PC when I have some spare time.So, a comfortable chair is a must for me since I sit in front of my monitors for many hours. I thought that a gaming chair was what I needed, since a lot of my workmates were so into it, so I bought one.Unfortunately, what I bought failed to deliver everything that it promised, and its faux leather material was simply falling apart after just four months and was very uncomfortable to me, unless I covered the seat with some towel. I ended up giving away that gaming chair.A friend of mine suggested a mesh chair with lumbar support. So, I started looking here on Amazon.I looked at quite a few chairs and read their reviews until I stumbled upon this one from Logicfox. Its modernistic design along with multiple awesome features got me very interested, so I bought this.Installation was very quick and straight forward. I love the 3 lockable reclining positions and the adjustable lumbar cushion which has provided me some much needed back relief!The adjustable armrest is a great bonus! It's quite unique, since this is the first of its kind for me which allows for up and down, forward and backward, and even rotation adjustments.The mesh back and mesh seat allow for air to flow which in turn keeps me cool.In short, I really love this chair! It's very comfortable and stable and loaded with a bunch of amazing features! I very highly recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing office chair! I like the mesh material which makes it good looking. The seat is not too soft not too hard. Great support for back and neck. The hand rests are adjustable. I sit on it for multiple hours and does not feel tired. A little bit narrow but does not affect much. Height is easily adjustable. Quality is great. Worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty happy with it.
reviews.reviewText: Everything is great except one thing. Locking the recline function keeps the back rest too far forward for me to be comfortable. I'm still happy with the chair because I tightened the tension on the recline so it still supports me fairly comfortably. I am 6'0 and 205lbs and this chair adjusts to my size well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The chair is very well built, looks stylish and easy to assemble. The back is tall enough for 6ft person. The wheels are rubber like, is which a plus over plastic as they glide easier and quieter on laminate/wooden floor. The arm rests have a lot of adjustability and do not wobble like on cheaper chairs.The reason for deducting 2 starts was the comfortability. It is not comfortable at all, as the back of the chair is sitting too forward, or the bottom piece is too far back. I wish there was either adjustably for the bottom piece (cushion) or it was longer. When sitting on the chair, if feels like you are sliding off of it and constantly trying to sit back.This chair was bough for home use, while at work we have Haworth Zody which is very comfortable (yes the price difference is substantial) however the bottom cushion is adjustable and from factory it sits more forward. If this was an option on Logicfox chair, I bet it would have been more comfortable, or unless you are smaller than 6ft, it might work well for you as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, easy to assemble chair, with A+ customer service.
reviews.reviewText: The chair is very good looking, wider than many, and extremely comfortable for a long day in front of the computer. It fits tall folks just as well as shorter folks.Assembly took maybe 15 minutes, and had great instructions should you get stuck.Used it everyday for 6 months, then the seat frame broke. The frame is made of Nylon I think, and the only thing I can think is that I just got one made on a Friday afternoon.I sent in an email to LogicFox customer support, and received a response within a couple hours. They didn't have the part in stock, but It should be available in a week or so. Today I got another response from them saying they would replace the entire chair. That is great customer service, something you just don't find often in office chair companies, and with a 3 year warranty your in great shape.I highly recommend this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and comfortable office chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair is very ergonomic and comfortable. I'm very happy with every aspect of the product, including the setup. It is very simple to assemble and the quality of the materials used is very good. The adjustable function provides great comfort. It has very good support and will not feel uncomfortable even if it works for a long time. I'm very happy with the purchase so far. 10/10 Recommend it!
